title: New: Alex Forte – B.I.C.
body:
This is definitely a first for me.

Hearing someone rap over a Future Islands (Doves to be precise) sample is a pretty good talking point, and somewhat bizarrely, it works. This latest track from Cleveland’s **Alex Forte**, lifted from a recent EP release, has a Kanye Graduation vibe to it at points in the delivery; playful yet undeniably slick – not to mention covering some pretty important, hard hitting subjects. Check it out below.

This latest track from Cleveland’s Alex Forte, lifted from a recent EP release, has a Kanye Graduation vibe to it at points in the delivery; \[…\]
